title: Organic Hitsukiya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A 100% organic restaurant located 3 minutes from Chiba Station's North Exit. Does not serve red meat or poultry; fish and seafood only. A vegan lunch set, yasai gozen, and a-la-carte vegan dishes are available, none of which are labeled on the Japanese menu, so please ask staff. At times also has vegan baked goods. Address in Japanese: 千葉県千葉市中央区弁天1-15-8
